message: tmux session management is fully functional - 5 active agent sessions detected with accessible PIDs and output capture
Comprehensive tmux integration guide completed with 3 implementation options: read-only streaming (safest), xterm.js web terminal (recommended), and external terminal launch (simplest)

implementation_options: Option A: Terminal Command Launch - Opens system terminal with tmux attach
Option B: xterm.js WebSocket - Full web terminal in browser (RECOMMENDED)
Option C: Read-Only Log Stream - Secure SSE-based log viewer (SAFEST)
security_measures: Input validation for command injection prevention
Audit logging of all terminal access
